conclusion: Determine power consumed by circuit and compare with 15W
Identify circuit components: R1 = 20Ω, R2 = 10Ω, I0 = 0.5A, voltage U constant
Calculate voltage U using open-switch condition: U = 10V
Analyze closed-switch condition: motor connected in parallel with R1
Calculate total current when switch is closed: I_total = 1.5A
Calculate power P consumed by circuit: P = 15W
Final answer: Electric power P consumed by circuit is equal to 15W
